content: Is there a mul_action instance on docs#quotient_group.quotient that corresponds to left-multiplication under the quotient?
With smul := fun r, quotient.map' (Î» x, r * x) sorry, where I have a proof of the sorry locally
(note that in the case I'm thinking of, the subgroup I'm taking the quotient by is not normal)
docs#mul_action.quotient, I was distracted looking in quotient_group
